Tutorial.Tutorial_Op0_001: [Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="716936dd63ff40e4a3b4aafca39a59ba" Scale="1"/]I am [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="CaptainOlimar"/]Captain Olimar[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].
Tutorial.Tutorial_Op0_002:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="bf5baa0d532845d28fb212cc9ddbe5c1" Scale="1"/]I command a spaceship
called the S.S. Dolphin.
Tutorial.Tutorial_Op0_003:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="764974febf30415388ee37f27b6be934" Scale="1"/]This is the story of how I
crashed onto an unknown planet...
Tutorial.Tutorial_Op0_004: [Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="7a598a511aa2401886f8d721d1859c65" Scale="1"/]and how I was ultimately rescued.
Tutorial.Tutorial_Op0_005:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="1ac519b1a6564ef986a2b05a3c4e25c3" Scale="1"/]After the crash, I woke up to find my ship
was in pieces, scattered everywhere.
Tutorial.Tutorial_Op0_006:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="853653445c5e4e02b0a55ecb51725810" Scale="1"/]I had no way of returning
home to my beloved family.
Tutorial.Tutorial_Op0_007: [Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="829ff0c37a534942904f1d29cf713024" Scale="1"/]I thought I was doomed...
Tutorial.Tutorial_Op0_008:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="c3d627d648c043d483e29b58d7356f8f" Scale="1"/]until I encountered a strange
species, which I named Pikmin.
Tutorial.Tutorial_Op0_009:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="e4f0f2685d544b469708ad38f581990b" Scale="1"/]The Pikmin had an innate desire
or will to carry objects.
Tutorial.Tutorial_Op0_010:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="41c7827445444ef1af28896fae6fc4b4" Scale="1"/]With their help, I was able to find
and transport my missing ship parts.
Tutorial.Tutorial_Op0_011:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="2f899353261d4d1180cd0906ae8b8ba5" Scale="1"/]Time passed, and I met yet
another mysterious creature.
Tutorial.Tutorial_Op0_012: [Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="b46dada830e246bd98a079e15d1d66d9" Scale="1"/]It appeared to be malnourished...
Tutorial.Tutorial_Op0_012_1: [Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="519ccd67b25f4718a70b8a5347140713" Scale="1"/]so I tossed over a treat.
Tutorial.Tutorial_Op0_013: [Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="a80c98b9575e4462a958fb6a391d5eba" Scale="1"/]After that, we quickly bonded.
Tutorial.Tutorial_Op0_015:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="9302ea7ead5540759fdb7c350dd1bef7" Scale="1"/]She is a steadfast partner in the quest to
find the missing pieces of my spaceship.
Tutorial.Tutorial_Op0_016: [Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="3e39eb6a35264c2abe8cc2b42fc6fd4e" Scale="1"/]A quest that was nearing its end...
Tutorial.Tutorial_Area010_OlimarStart_01_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="2c506ccb4bf242e1aa29545dfd7d3f2d" Scale="1"/]We arrived at the last area
we had left to explore.
Tutorial.Tutorial_Area010_OlimarStart_01_02: [Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="ebf29040a0df45e88766e5b2394ab578" Scale="1"/]What is this place?
Tutorial.Tutorial_Area010_OlimarStart_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][Npc:ResetMotion enable="1"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="202a02c5fa6344a3b93f170027694e70" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Something about this area is different
from the others we've explored so far...
Tutorial.Tutorial_Area010_OlimarStart_02_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][Npc:ResetMotion enable="1"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="ee19d7a774ce4d62bfbbdb761edbdb90" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]That can't be a good sign.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] The Pikmin don't
usually scurry off like that.
Tutorial.Tutorial_Area010_OlimarStart_02_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][Npc:ResetMotion enable="1"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="c210c875eaa9449bbe8acf44c0a2ddb1" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="4" Type="2" From="1"/][Npc:Motion name="WaitNoVoice"/][Npc:Motion chara="GHappy" name="Happy_Listen" lipsync="0"/]I suppose I'll have to call them back while I
search for the missing ship parts.
Tutorial.Tutorial_Area010_OlimarStart_02_Reaction: [Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="b0efb249909f4c5995cb22016f6f9bec" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="GHappy" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Carrot:LocalizeLanguage key="EUen"/]
Tutorial.Tutorial_Area010_Discovery_CrackPot_01: [Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="a2d5e1b5bd4845678e6546422d610e68" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="HappyWaitThink"/]I saw some of the Pikmin head this way.
Tutorial.Tutorial_Area010_Discovery_CrackPot_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="3b9ea58452e04c5781ec174baa50642c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]They could be hiding behind those things.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Let's break them and see.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="3b9ea58452e04c5781ec174baa50642c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="HappyWait"/]When we jump,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I'll start charging up
my pup's strength...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="3b9ea58452e04c5781ec174baa50642c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="HappyWaitAngry"/]I just need to press [PictureFont:IconData key="Dash" scale="0.66"/] and [PictureFont:IconData key="Long_Press_Button" scale="0.66"/]hold down,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
then take aim. [etc:Wait frame="15"/]When she's at full strength,
I'll let go and let her [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Rush[System:Color name="Default"]!
Tutorial.Tutorial_Area010_JoinPikmin_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="38404e759c34432bb1501dd754230b4c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="HappyYes"/]Aha![etc:Wait frame="8"/] I knew it![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="38404e759c34432bb1501dd754230b4c" Scale="1"/]Now I'll use [PictureFont:IconData key="Whistle" scale="0.66"/][PictureFont:IconData key="Long_Press_Button" scale="0.66"/] to [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]call them back to me
with my whistle[System:Color name="Default"].
Tutorial.Tutorial_Area010_JoinPikmin_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="8e37f6a358b74b7caa311fd198906a1a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="HappyThink"/]I just wish I knew why the Pikmin ran away
and hid in the first place...
Tutorial.Tutorial_Area010_JoinPikmin_Intro:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="0b11a788f4bd40b28eb967f304f1b64b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="HappyTabletLookStart"/]Hmm.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I better make a note of this in my
Voyage Log.
Tutorial.Tutorial_Area010_JoinPikmin_Reaction01: [Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="b98cf66fffe64980ae5c860137f531df" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="HappyWait" lipsync="0"/][Carrot:LocalizeLanguage key="EUen"/]
Tutorial.Tutorial_Area010_JoinPikmin_Reaction02: [Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="a0fcd8077d134b1392ab913a309de2ec" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="HappyWait" lipsync="0"/][Carrot:LocalizeLanguage key="EUen"/]
Tutorial.Tutorial_Area010_JoinPikmin_Choise_01: [Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][Msg:BCancel enable="False"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="a35bc01aa9324c2ba7d6e8427aeda50a" Scale="1"/]Record in Log
Tutorial.Tutorial_Area010_JoinPikmin_Choise_02: [Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][Msg:BCancel enable="False"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="9e6f824aa5644fadb8e5c7f5fc727bc2" Scale="1"/]Record Later
Tutorial.Tutorial_Area010_JoinPikmin_Branch_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="9de791bfc3c8443f8d16da9b4b88d151" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="HappyTabletLookStart"/]You never know when this kind of
information will prove useful.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Now,
how to phrase it...
Tutorial.Tutorial_Area010_JoinPikmin_Branch_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="b1a69ba8d2f74922bacf3c09198077f0" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="HappyTabletLookStart"/]No, no.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I'll save future [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Olimar"/]Olimar[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] the trouble
and record it while it's fresh in my mind.
Tutorial.Tutorial_Area010_JoinPikmin_Reaction03: [Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="2f5ca1af9fab4f609c4908211d3cde58" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="HappyTabletLookEnd" lipsync="0"/][Carrot:LocalizeLanguage key="EUen"/]
Tutorial.Tutorial_Area010_JoinPikmin:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="2e4278eb73a7426c97c9cb577ce468fa" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="HappyYes"/]I need to find my missing ship parts,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
but it will be much easier if I have more
Pikmin to help me.
Tutorial.Tutorial_Area010_SearchSmell_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="6ff253a301154c9784a0ea7d6d4a5654" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="HappyThink"/]OK, there has to be a ship part around
here somewhere...
Tutorial.Tutorial_Area010_SearchSmell_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="1fe28b3d473a46428e861637c001d136" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="HappyYesNoVoice"/]This is the perfect situation to rely upon
my pup's powerful nose.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Track down one of
those ship parts, girl!
Tutorial.Tutorial_Area010_SearchSmell_03: [Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="3a21b69262b7497d864bc7542a81d014" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="HappyYes"/]We need to [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]stay on that scent[System:Color name="Default"]...
Tutorial.Tutorial_Area010_Discovery_Hari_02_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="8a17eafd369d4784ab6fb25294197f14" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="WaitAngry"/]A creature?![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="8a17eafd369d4784ab6fb25294197f14" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="WaitNoVoice"/]I don't see any ship parts...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Could that
thing have swallowed one whole?!
Tutorial.Tutorial_Area010_Discovery_Hari_02_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="506b22436e624cf5becbdfea8b45a3ee" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Those spiky things are going to make this
tough.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I have to find an opening...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="506b22436e624cf5becbdfea8b45a3ee" Scale="1"/]Maybe I should use [PictureFont:IconData key="Dash" scale="0.66"/][PictureFont:IconData key="Long_Press_Button" scale="0.66"/] to build up energy
so we can Rush the creature when the
time is right...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="506b22436e624cf5becbdfea8b45a3ee" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]In the meantime, let's circle it and wait
for a chance to strike!
Tutorial.Tutorial_Area010_Prologue_SecondWave_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="15712e46fca74385b025ea7ab4562075" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad02"/][Sound:PlayVoice Key="Vo_Hero_Area010_Defeat_Hari"/]It's the Interstellar Radio![etc:Wait frame="15"/] We located it
at last![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="15712e46fca74385b025ea7ab4562075" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly"/]With this back in my possession,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I can
finally call for help!
Tutorial.Tutorial_Opening_00: [Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="ae96224b2f864e1a8fae12252e1f6279" Scale="1"/]I had recovered the Interstellar Radio!
Tutorial.Tutorial_Opening_01: [Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="a0516f7806264d939d281eb9c90ce9de" Scale="1"/]So I immediately sent out an SOS signal...
Tutorial.Tutorial_Opening_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="b3885fd30d2a4f70baf3ee5950c51a7f" Scale="1"/]and attached the latest
version of my Voyage Log.
Tutorial.Tutorial_Opening_04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="a487225795734905ae4f75c798cdf6d8" Scale="1"/]Days and weeks passed.
But one month later...
Tutorial.Tutorial_Opening_12: [Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="afa5c72628c24e8da03b74959b933b1a" Scale="1"/]my signal reached the Rescue Corps.
Tutorial.Tutorial_Opening_13:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="f56891df84ac4cea96074680d70dd95b" Scale="1"/]They took off toward this remote planet
with noble plans to bring me home safe.
Tutorial.Tutorial_Opening_14: [Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="08283dda9a2c449db2b1f68ba2603cb7" Scale="1"/]Unfortunately, fate had other ideas.
Tutorial.Tutorial_Opening_14_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="68924a6b559e4f07b3c6e23222dca49f" Scale="1"/]The Rescue Officers sent to rescue me
crash-landed during their arrival.
Tutorial.Tutorial_Opening_15_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="3107403391f641e1a54efcf9dd445c7b" Scale="1"/]Double shipwrecks are rare...
and extremely unlucky.
Tutorial.Tutorial_Opening_15_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="1ef69a92a3dc4a3cbcdcec69bebd1924" Scale="1"/]At this point, you might
think that all hope was lost.
Tutorial.Tutorial_Opening_15_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="2e7b759c714045ff926d10c03281aae9" Scale="1"/]But there was one last Rescue Officer left
at Rescue Corps HQ. A rookie. You.
Tutorial.Tutorial_Opening_15_04: [Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="9dab33db0b6c473ea8008375c9bbaf57" Scale="1"/]That's right. You are my last hope.
Tutorial.Tutorial_Opening_16: [Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="c3312b9fdd66455da7fc3b80b52ba276" Scale="1"/]Not only my fate...
Tutorial.Tutorial_Opening_17: [Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="a9477696cfe749e3a9b06048de170fe8" Scale="1"/]but the fate of the Rescue Corps...
Tutorial.Tutorial_Opening_18:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="f0d7ca13f1f24968bbda3aa63aaacbeb" Scale="1"/]rest in the hands of one
inexperienced adventurer.
Tutorial.Tutorial_DiscoveryHappy_Reaction01: [Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="47bea08b4c7745dda16f31d247fd877e" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="4" Type="1" From="4"/][Carrot:LocalizeLanguage key="EUen"/]
Tutorial.Tutorial_DiscoveryOperator_Reaction02: [Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="19d403e7341049308e36f0c78b1dda07" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="4" Type="2" From="3"/][Carrot:LocalizeLanguage key="EUen"/]
Tutorial.Tutorial_DiscoveryOperator_Reaction03: [Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="214947f1cef1457d9da57510e3cc2e56" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="9" Type="1" From="3"/][Carrot:LocalizeLanguage key="EUen"/]
Tutorial.Tutorial_DiscoveryOperator_Reaction04: [Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="d719da98ad1745818d3107075add3261" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="0" Type="2" From="3"/][Carrot:LocalizeLanguage key="EUen"/]
Tutorial.Tutorial_Tutorial_Demo_TalkGuide_01: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal01_NoName"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="0ba3bc1614d1461a83fc5f5b1181bb56" Scale="1"/][Sound:PlayVoice Key="Vo_Tutorial_TalkGuide_01"/]Urgh...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Hrm...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Huh?[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Is that you, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]?
Tutorial.Tutorial_Tutorial_Demo_TalkGuide_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01_NoName"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="795b89d410354553bc3507ffd83905a4" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad02"/][Sound:PlayVoice Key="Vo_Tutorial_TalkGuide_02"/]Thank the stars![etc:Wait frame="8"/] I wasn't sure that my
SOS signal had reached HQ![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="795b89d410354553bc3507ffd83905a4" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]So you and [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] found and rescued
me...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]together?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="795b89d410354553bc3507ffd83905a4" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]That's actually quite surprising.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I've never
known [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] to listen to anyone other
than our captain.
Tutorial.Tutorial_Tutorial_Demo_TalkGuide_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="422f2e56b19540e5baef5e4f00256684" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Oh![etc:Wait frame="8"/] I should probably introduce myself.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
I'm [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal01"/]Collin[Npc:EmphasisEnd/],[etc:Wait frame="8"/] communications operator for
the Rescue Corps.
Tutorial.Tutorial_Tutorial_Demo_TalkGuide_04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="d656fcd80bf94bd0a553893c6c8fbccc" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SadTalk"/]My path got cut off by a small landslide,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
and when my hunger became unbearable,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
I decided to nap to preserve my stamina.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="d656fcd80bf94bd0a553893c6c8fbccc" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="QuestionFaceOnly"/]You're our latest recruit,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] right?[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
It's [Replace:ReplaceName Index="PlayerName"/],[etc:Wait frame="8"/] isn't it?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="d656fcd80bf94bd0a553893c6c8fbccc" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]I couldn't be more grateful to you for
rescuing me.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="d656fcd80bf94bd0a553893c6c8fbccc" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/]As I mentioned before,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I was the one who
sent out that emergency signal.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] The rest
of the Rescue Corps,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] well...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="d656fcd80bf94bd0a553893c6c8fbccc" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]It was a rough landing.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] We entered the
planet's atmosphere and lost control
of the ship...
Tutorial.Tutorial_Tutorial_Demo_TalkGuide_05:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="79fcb06a4c7b43efb6a501220ee5d53f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]I have no idea.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="79fcb06a4c7b43efb6a501220ee5d53f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SadFaceOnly"/]There were six officers on the ship,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but
we were separated when we ejected from
the spacecraft.
Tutorial.Tutorial_Tutorial_Demo_TalkGuide_05_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="f849596728234a859bbfd3f3e4bd63e8" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]Oh yes.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I've spent days sleeping out here
in the rough...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="f849596728234a859bbfd3f3e4bd63e8" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SadFaceOnly"/]There were six officers on the ship,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but
we were separated when we ejected from
the spacecraft.
Tutorial.Tutorial_Tutorial_Demo_TalkGuide_05_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="4d07a79e12844b409aab4b678759a18b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]We came here to find [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="CaptainOlimar"/]Captain Olimar[Npc:EmphasisEnd/],
whose own ship had crashed,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] only to
suffer the same fate.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="4d07a79e12844b409aab4b678759a18b" Scale="1"/]It's almost embarrassing...
Tutorial.Tutorial_Tutorial_Demo_TalkGuide_05_04: [Npc:Icon chara="Dummy"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="a6d7cace2f154401b40a35a074f5458f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_01_Survivor" name="Wait"/][Carrot:LocalizeLanguage key="EUen"/]
Tutorial.Tutorial_Tutorial_Demo_TalkGuide_05_05: [Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="d607d52ab8ab452882ce644bcf18f6f0" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="0" Type="2" From="3"/][Carrot:LocalizeLanguage key="EUen"/]
Tutorial.Tutorial_Tutorial_Demo_TalkGuide_06:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="36ec38ccbc434d1eb9585ea220b69429" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]I've confirmed that our spaceship,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
the [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]S.S. Shepherd[System:Color name="Default"],[etc:Wait frame="8"/] landed somewhere
over there.
Tutorial.Tutorial_Tutorial_Demo_TalkGuide_07:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="da7091af0dfe4cacb020ba43afc24a81" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]But I couldn't reach it on my own.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Now that
you're here,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] maybe we can find a way back
to it.
Tutorial.Tutorial_Tutorial_Demo_TalkGuide_08:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="84a27de3e7fd4c72a924a84a0b8c4f71" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]And if we're lucky,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] we'll come across a few
stranded Rescue Officers along the way.
Tutorial.Tutorial_Tutorial_Demo_TalkGuide_09:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="a2fbecede0ac4deba88376be2389661c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TabletGive"/]Oh,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] before I forget.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Take this.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="a2fbecede0ac4deba88376be2389661c" Scale="1"/]It's an official Rescue Corps [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Tablet[System:Color name="Default"]![etc:Wait frame="15"/]
We use them to share information.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Thank goodness I always carry an extra.
Tutorial.Tutorial_Tutorial_Demo_TalkGuide_09_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="023bbe986e4e4eb681627ed83ccd6563" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TabletGive"/]Tap [PictureFont:IconData key="Up_Button" scale="0.66"/] on the left side there to open and
review your [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]missions[System:Color name="Default"].
Tutorial.Tutorial_Tutorial_Demo_TalkGuide_09_01_Y: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="f4a395628de4476a878f72245ed413bf" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TabletGive"/]Press [PictureFont:IconData key="Press_Stick" scale="0.66"/] to review our [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]missions[System:Color name="Default"].

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:ResetMotion enable="1"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="6645cfaf405b4039aad45114746303bb" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Wait"/]You can use this app anytime to confirm

but I'll install them later when we have a

Tutorial.Tutorial_Tutorial_Demo_TalkGuide_10: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:ResetMotion enable="1"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="a1ccfcb9294148f4839f40fb929bd213" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Now then,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] let's go find the S.S. Shepherd!
Tutorial.Area500_Tutorial_DiscoverySpaceBus_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="2407eb5b1db74d699aa262c3fdd9221c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]There she is![etc:Wait frame="8"/] The S.S. Shepherd![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="2407eb5b1db74d699aa262c3fdd9221c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SadFaceOnly"/]I can see the ship,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but I have no idea how
we're going to reach it from here.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="2407eb5b1db74d699aa262c3fdd9221c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]You know...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]there's something familiar
about this area. [etc:Wait frame="15"/]I remember something![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="2407eb5b1db74d699aa262c3fdd9221c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]It's just up ahead.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Let's go!
Tutorial.Tutorial_DeadEnd_Reaction01: [Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="7e32c0dd41a54d2799608f9fcdcea2fc" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="6" Type="2" From="3"/][Carrot:LocalizeLanguage key="EUen"/]
Tutorial.Tutorial_DeadEnd_01:

Tutorial.Tutorial_DeadEnd_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:ResetMotion enable="1"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="fed9ddc1059c4b059e6abbea20e7aa93" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SadFaceOnly"/]If only we could find a way there...[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Then we could finally reunite with
the S.S. Shepherd!

Tutorial.Tutorial_DiggingMadoriRuins_03: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:ResetMotion enable="1"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="f8ac71c48f8f4ef2a13f86185ba084cd" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Almost there...

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="4f7200c0de614dcb82977439e638cc63" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="GAvatar" name="Glad" lipsync="0"/][Npc:LookAt To="4" Type="2" From="0"/][Npc:LookAt To="9" Type="2" From="4"/]You can see why Rescue Pups are the

Tutorial.Tutorial_DiggingMadoriRuins_05:

connected underground...
Tutorial.Tutorial_DiggingMadoriRuins_07:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:ResetMotion enable="1"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="0cf3f9d4cf0e450ead54763d2c022b65" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/][Npc:LookAt To="0" Type="2" From="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="9" Type="2" From="3"/]It looks pretty deep.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] We're just going to

down there...

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:ResetMotion enable="1"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="deb9d5b3aea04672a4077b6e4b5f202f" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="4" Type="2" From="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="4" Type="2" From="3"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/][Sound:PlayVoice Key="Vo_Cave000_RescueSkill_01"/]Hey![etc:Wait frame="8"/] What is it, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="deb9d5b3aea04672a4077b6e4b5f202f" Scale="1"/]He's trying to tell us something...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Perhaps
another Rescue Officer is down here.
Tutorial.Tutorial_Cave000_Discovery_Trainer_00_Se: [Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="a549d890b1e84e0e9a1f000acc3ee360" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="10" Type="2" From="3"/][Npc:LookAt To="10" Type="2" From="7"/][Carrot:LocalizeLanguage key="EUen"/]
Tutorial.Tutorial_Cave000_Discovery_Trainer_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="2af7e8d162484e48895edfa827391551" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]Oh my...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] What a place to find the captain![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="2af7e8d162484e48895edfa827391551" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]That terrified individual you see over there
is the captain of our Rescue Corps team.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="8e48565abc514417af2023a5f7ada012" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]The captain comes from a long line of
Rescue Officers going back gen—
Tutorial.Tutorial_Cave000_Discovery_Trainer_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:LookAtInterpolation enable="0"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="26632f5dd36f430983daa96868fbddf1" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="NoMotionAngry"/][Sound:PlayVoice Key="Vo_Cave000_Discovery_Trainer_01"/]This is no time for a history lesson![etc:Wait frame="8"/]

Tutorial.Tutorial_Cave000_Join_Trainer_00_SetUp: [Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="b57fb45c6647453c9f2d1d205b419ef0" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="0" Type="2" From="3"/][Npc:LookAt To="0" Type="2" From="7"/][Carrot:LocalizeLanguage key="EUen"/]

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:ResetMotion enable="1"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="6e437a234ac64e5e80eca4d8055d8d76" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]Phew.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Now we can relax a bit.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="6e437a234ac64e5e80eca4d8055d8d76" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Captain,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] we took care of the creatures
down here.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Can you get down?
Tutorial.Tutorial_Cave000_Join_Trainer_04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="059af3144f4d4982be208d53211ac169" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="NoMotionAngry"/][etc:Wait frame="15"/][Sound:PlayVoice Key="Vo_Cave000_Join_Trainer_04"/]I hope so.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] My arms are almost numb I've
been hanging on so long.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] OK,[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I can do this.
Tutorial.Tutorial_Cave000_Join_Trainer_05_SetUp: [Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="c7c7032c89594623a602ba7b720f486c" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="9" Type="2" From="6"/][Carrot:LocalizeLanguage key="EUen"/]
Tutorial.Tutorial_Cave000_Join_Trainer_05: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="9fce6851dd88434cb73d20c14ce22b52" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="9" Type="2" From="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/][Sound:PlayVoice Key="Vo_Cave000_Join_Trainer_05"/]What's your status, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal01"/]Collin[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Are you OK?
Tutorial.Tutorial_Cave000_Join_Trainer_06:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="6e312df611d44044a863f4707cd7bdb0" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]Shouldn't I be asking you that?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I'm just
relieved to see you're alright.
Tutorial.Tutorial_Cave000_Join_Trainer_07:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="b00790b25ef746a097f92909baef88ce" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="3" Type="2" From="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_01_Survivor" name="Wait"/]Oh—you![etc:Wait frame="8"/] I haven't seen you since rookie
training camp.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I'm Captain [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal02"/]Shepherd[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] of the
Rescue Corps,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] if you don't remember.
Tutorial.Tutorial_Cave000_Join_Trainer_07_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="b7c32da3f6594f429b8291ea15642e81" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]Did you order [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] to get rid of
those creatures all by yourself,
[Replace:ReplaceName Index="PlayerName"/]?[etc:Wait frame="30"/] Huh.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="b7c32da3f6594f429b8291ea15642e81" Scale="1"/][System:Color name="NoVoice" ]Oatchi's not supposed to obey anyone
but me...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="b7c32da3f6594f429b8291ea15642e81" Scale="1"/][System:Color name="Default"][Npc:Motion name="GoodJob"/]Guess that rookie training paid off after
all, didn't it?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="b7c32da3f6594f429b8291ea15642e81" Scale="1"/]You know,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] the first time I saw you in
training,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I had a feeling you'd make a
top-notch dog trainer.
Tutorial.Tutorial_Cave000_Join_Trainer_08:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="bc90ed31015a471fa26bbb35eb502abf" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="6"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_02_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/]Sorry to interrupt, Captain,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but, uh...[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
What were you doing down here, anyway?
Tutorial.Tutorial_Cave000_Join_Trainer_09:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="adf2da782f274e33a2f9403dd6b59c0e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]While exploring the surface,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I discovered a
suspicious hole.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I leaned over to take a
look inside...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]and fell right in.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="adf2da782f274e33a2f9403dd6b59c0e" Scale="1"/]I wandered around this cave, trying to find
an exit, when I came up on those icky,
slimy creatures...
Tutorial.Tutorial_Cave000_Join_Trainer_10:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="db3ac1962a1d4a5fb59b86980b31d618" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_02_Survivor" name="Wait"/]Hang on![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Did you fall down the hole located
near the S.S. Shepherd?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="db3ac1962a1d4a5fb59b86980b31d618" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]We entered this cave in an attempt to
reach that very opening!
Tutorial.Tutorial_Cave000_Join_Trainer_11:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="c51ae5886af24862a8d0cbaf7668deae" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_02_Survivor" name="Yes"/]Well then,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] what are we waiting around
here for?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="c51ae5886af24862a8d0cbaf7668deae" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="0" Type="2" From="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_02_Survivor" name="Command"/]Let's get back to the S.S. Shepherd!
Tutorial.Tutorial_Cave000_Join_Trainer_12: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="c222ccb0b716491ab4f90286e3f99297" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Roger02"/]Copy that!
Tutorial.Tutorial_Cave000_Join_Trainer_12_00: [Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="2c4c5965ed3445c19351701652dfe967" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="3" Type="2" From="4"/][Npc:LookAt To="0" Type="2" From="3"/][Npc:LookAt To="0" Type="2" From="7"/][Carrot:LocalizeLanguage key="EUen"/]
Tutorial.Tutorial_Cave000_Join_Trainer_12_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="5c5f1c377adc4aebb7487848a7e455be" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="3" Type="2" From="6"/][Npc:LookAt To="3" Type="2" From="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_02_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]Is something wrong?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] You didn't say
anything, [Replace:ReplaceName Index="PlayerName"/].[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="5c5f1c377adc4aebb7487848a7e455be" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]"Copy that!" is the Rescue Corps way of
saying, "Understood!"[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Let's try saying it
together,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] OK?
Tutorial.Tutorial_Cave000_Join_Trainer_13: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="434125f1b8024b5a86b774501fa6322d" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="10" Type="2" From="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Roger02"/]Copy that!
Tutorial.Tutorial_Cave000_Join_Trainer_14_Reactio: [Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="8f12ce8f5ed647299439b43f962137a5" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="GAvatar" name="Roger02"/][Npc:Motion chara="GHappy" name="ICopy"/][Carrot:LocalizeLanguage key="EUen"/]

[Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="6121a97ef9c943caa794d40f9a834c58" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="10" Type="2" From="3"/][Npc:Motion chara="GAvatar" name="Yes" lipsync="0"/][Carrot:LocalizeLanguage key="EUen"/]
Tutorial.Tutorial_Cave000_Join_Trainer_15_01: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="0978c446fb9743b396a7ac2f96acd2c9" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="0" Type="2" From="4"/][Npc:LookAt To="3" Type="2" From="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Very good![etc:Wait frame="8"/] Excellent reply.
Tutorial.Tutorial_Cave000_Join_Trainer_15_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="3118581304514667993c15a5aaaa62d3" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="0" Type="2" From="4"/][Npc:LookAt To="3" Type="2" From="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Hmm...[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I'm sure you're just nervous.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] This is
your first official mission, after all.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="3118581304514667993c15a5aaaa62d3" Scale="1"/]It'll all come naturally to you soon enough.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Don't worry.
Tutorial.Tutorial_Cave000_Join_Trainer_16:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="164901c81018434b95bcbfa1e1fb19b0" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]That said,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] you'll need to review the Rescue
Corps [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Rescue Journal [System:Color name="Default"]for your upcoming
missions.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] It's essential to our work.
Tutorial.Tutorial_Cave000_Join_Trainer_16_SetUp01: [Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="5e853afc95714ddc806974a0747fab64" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="0" Type="2" From="6"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_02_Survivor" name="TabletLookStart" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="GAvatar" name="WaitNoVoice" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_01_Survivor" name="WaitNoVoice" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="GHappy" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Carrot:LocalizeLanguage key="EUen"/]
Tutorial.Tutorial_Cave000_Join_Trainer_17:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="0089007342ca4b959c78f47d25964130" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="3" Type="2" From="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="0" Type="2" From="7"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]You'll be able to access them via your
[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Tablet[System:Color name="Default"] as the need arises,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] so put them
to good use while out in the field.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="0089007342ca4b959c78f47d25964130" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/][Sound:PlayVoice Key="NoVoice"/]Since [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] and you have bonded,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
I officially approve of your partnership.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="0089007342ca4b959c78f47d25964130" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Command"/]I'll be observing you both to see what skills
you have as a Rescue Pup trainer!
Tutorial.Tutorial_Cave000_Join_Trainer_Setup: [Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="2228b83d341145d3867a7b14a5904393" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="21" Type="2" From="6"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_02_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Carrot:LocalizeLanguage key="EUen"/]
Tutorial.Tutorial_DiscoveryDungeonExit_P00: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="09e2efb9fe294e7aa29e689f872bdbba" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="WaitAngry"/]There![etc:Wait frame="15"/] That's where I fell in!
Tutorial.Tutorial_DiscoveryDungeonExit_P01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="726d68a9c25f4f87a6a0b0c51b3e8612" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="WaitSad"/]My word...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] To think you survived a fall from
that height...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="726d68a9c25f4f87a6a0b0c51b3e8612" Scale="1"/]But more importantly,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] how are we
supposed to climb up there?
Tutorial.Tutorial_Area500_EnterSpaceBus_00_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="c0b59ef4c7254dfa80167cc4b41aac78" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="3" Type="2" From="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]Excuse me, [Replace:ReplaceName Index="PlayerName"/].[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="c0b59ef4c7254dfa80167cc4b41aac78" Scale="1"/]I suggest you exercise a bit more caution
when encountering something unfamiliar.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Maybe don't just...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]touch it.
Tutorial.Tutorial_Area500_EnterSpaceBus_00_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:ResetMotion enable="1"/][UE:Meta key="7b0eabb6003b4a4ab80bf61e8d173a14" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="10" Type="2" From="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_02_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]I completely agree![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Though, in this case,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
your impulsive behavior did get us out of
that cave.
Tutorial.Tutorial_Area500_EnterSpaceBus_01_SetUp: [Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="c30c21eff14d443dbaded9d5edc9f732" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="9" Type="2" From="6"/][Carrot:LocalizeLanguage key="EUen"/]
Tutorial.Tutorial_Area500_EnterSpaceBus_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="f1b9eb4da4094ab08ac76b830043ea98" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="0"/][Npc:Motion name="Wait"/][Sound:PlayVoice Key="Vo_Area500_EnterSpaceBus_01"/]Alright, Captain![etc:Wait frame="15"/] The Rescue Corps flag
has been officially planted!
Tutorial.Tutorial_Area500_EnterSpaceBus_01_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="afc52c04ca2141249f458ca14d1abcd5" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/]Now for the status report on all
cave-related activities![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="afc52c04ca2141249f458ca14d1abcd5" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]We located and rescued one castaway,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
and no other individuals were found
during our search.
Tutorial.Tutorial_Area500_EnterSpaceBus_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="d86d2812d23c4b5c847be5ac6847fbe5" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Noted![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Then let's consider the
investigation of this cave complete.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="d86d2812d23c4b5c847be5ac6847fbe5" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="3" Type="2" From="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/]I hope this experience will help you prepare
for the challenges inherent to our work.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
There are lives depending on us.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="d86d2812d23c4b5c847be5ac6847fbe5" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GoodJob"/]But you both did good work today.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Well done, [Replace:ReplaceName Index="PlayerName"/] and [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]!
Tutorial.Tutorial_Area500_EnterSpaceBus_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="8288ecbf3cd6464c95f954ed980fb94a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="WaitSadNoVoice"/][System:Color name="NoVoice" ]I guess we're just going to skip right over
the fact that we had to rescue the
captain herself...[System:Color name="Default"]
Tutorial.Tutorial_Area500_EnterSpaceBus_03_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="b3b5f4d1862a4c2090466b38d546358a" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="9" Type="2" From="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="7"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_01_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal01"/]Collin[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]... [etc:Wait frame="8"/]You look different since the last
time I saw you. [etc:Wait frame="15"/]Did you do something new
with your hair?
Tutorial.Tutorial_Area500_EnterSpaceBus_03_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="c0fbbe3b1c0243c3bc388a618c94df40" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]I don't think so.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I've been a bit busy trying
to, you know...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]stay alive.
Tutorial.Tutorial_Area500_EnterSpaceBus_04: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:ResetMotion enable="1"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="05d246d8dec1495d9d1b7f2c6b122c4e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Of course.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] And good for you.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] You did it![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="05d246d8dec1495d9d1b7f2c6b122c4e" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="0" Type="2" From="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_01_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion name="Command"/]Well, here she is.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] The S.S. Shepherd!
Tutorial.Tutorial_Area500_NearSpaceShip_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:ResetMotion enable="1"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="881c9e078916412f8b87864b0806c26b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]Is that...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]smoke pouring out of the
S.S. Shepherd?
Tutorial.Tutorial_Area500_NearSpaceShip_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:ResetMotion enable="1"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="a00c5d9fad634efcb0e6322980f8691a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Roger"/]I'll investigate right away![etc:Wait frame="15"/]
[System:Color name="NoVoice" ]Famous last words...[System:Color name="Default"]
Tutorial.Tutorial_Area500_NearSpaceShip_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="29d605f94ba74f6bb806ad894eb99ad7" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Roger"/]Status report![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="29d605f94ba74f6bb806ad894eb99ad7" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]Upon investigating the interior of the ship,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
I discovered the engine had overheated...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="29d605f94ba74f6bb806ad894eb99ad7" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]And that the spaceship was seconds away
from total destruction!
Tutorial.Tutorial_Area500_NearSpaceShip_03: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="d300a250c078486db72bd8fcd4735c4b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_01_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/]What?![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Oh no![etc:Wait frame="8"/] Will it be OK?!
Tutorial.Tutorial_Area500_NearSpaceShip_04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="a89aa612e03648e7b80f7e9f94352ee2" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="10" Type="2" From="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_02_Survivor" name="Wait"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]It will.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I initiated an emergency shutdown,
and everything's stable.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Thankfully, the
engine can be repaired.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="a89aa612e03648e7b80f7e9f94352ee2" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SadFaceOnly2"/]However,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] the ship's energy stores are now
completely empty.
Tutorial.Tutorial_Area500_NearSpaceShip_05:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="4b1c3c7966c049b99255b66c0b7f4108" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="10" Type="2" From="0"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]So we have no way of getting off
this planet, let alone searching
for [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="CaptainOlimar"/]Captain Olimar[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].
Tutorial.Tutorial_Area500_NearSpaceShip_06_SetUp: [Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="b72d8fdd4136446982628c3694f0be63" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_01_Survivor" name="TabletLookStart" lipsync="0"/][Carrot:LocalizeLanguage key="EUen"/]
Tutorial.Tutorial_Area500_NearSpaceShip_06:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="b2549d95f7be482297050adc2b7b5199" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="0" Type="2" From="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TabletLookLoop02"/]Not necessarily...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I think I saw something in
[Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="CaptainOlimar"/]Captain Olimar[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s Voyage Log that may
prove useful...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="b2549d95f7be482297050adc2b7b5199" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_02_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][etc:Wait frame="15"/]Here it is![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Take a look at this.
Tutorial.Tutorial_Area500_NearSpaceShip_07: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="ea5d9edf3b734c2887362a5c8ffacdc6" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_02_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/]In layman's terms...
Tutorial.Tutorial_Area500_NearSpaceShip_07_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="df11403ebcdd462a878bd01a2e4c58d2" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Wait"/]We should be able to extract [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]sparklium
[System:Color name="Default"]from sparkling objects that we find on
this planet and convert it into energy![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="df11403ebcdd462a878bd01a2e4c58d2" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="WaitGladNoVoice"/]If they can be used to restart and restore
the S.S. Shepherd,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] those objects truly are
nothing short of real-life [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]treasures[System:Color name="Default"].
Tutorial.Tutorial_Area500_NearSpaceShip_08:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="70f77fc98b6543bbb339637721926504" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="10" Type="2" From="0"/][Npc:LookAt To="0" Type="2" From="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_01_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/]I'm skeptical...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="70f77fc98b6543bbb339637721926504" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]But at this point,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] we have nothing to lose.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
This may be our only chance.
Tutorial.Tutorial_Area500_NearSpaceShip_09:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="baa4f3bcd00b4d7fa9cb1aa199b5502c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Command"/]So from this point on,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] we have a new
mission![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Find and collect all the sparkly
objects we can!
Tutorial.Tutorial_Area500_NearSpaceShip_10: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="551e6bb8fe294da5a6ce24756c030c27" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Roger02" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="GAvatar" name="YesFaceOnly"/]Copy that!
Tutorial.Tutorial_Area500_NearSpaceShip_10_standb: [Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="b865a8701a4343ad8c428e01da70800a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_01_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Carrot:LocalizeLanguage key="EUen"/]
Tutorial.Tutorial_Area500_NearSpaceShip_10_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="af8c6a93a9924bbf8fa44ce8b53e9964" Scale="1"/][Sound:DemoAudio Key="PlayMusic"/][Npc:LookAt To="0" Type="2" From="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_02_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/][Npc:Motion chara="GAvatar" name="Wait"/]Once we collect this treasure,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] we'll need a
way to transport it.
Tutorial.Tutorial_Area500_NearSpaceShip_11: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:ResetMotion enable="1"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="611836df4cc74dc4b3b8798dba202f4f" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="0" Type="2" From="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="GAvatar" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/]For that we can use the [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]S.S. Beagle[System:Color name="Default"].
Tutorial.Tutorial_Area500_NearSpaceShip_12_01: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:ResetMotion enable="1"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="bc7bbc355af34868af8b166648b32046" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sagasu"/][Sound:PlayVoice Key="Vo_Tutorial_NearSpaceShip_12_01"/]We just need a good place for it to land...
Tutorial.Tutorial_Area500_NearSpaceShip_12_02: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:ResetMotion enable="1"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="d068b0c0b3a84af28ec462fe82b1b65f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]Huh?[etc:Wait frame="8"/] What's that over there?
Tutorial.Tutorial_Area500_NearSpaceShip_15_00: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:ResetMotion enable="1"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="f5f30f4d38584253a9b1b306bda52258" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="WaitSurprise"/]It's so shiny...
Tutorial.Tutorial_Area500_NearSpaceShip_15:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="45823ac200ec4dcbaa1394b0fac4c082" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Wait"/]Maybe it's some sort of landmark,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but I'm
not completely sure.
Tutorial.Tutorial_Area500_NearSpaceShip_15_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:ResetMotion enable="1"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="070dcd1181744fbda41f306cf874376d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]It looks like the perfect spot for a [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]base[System:Color name="Default"] of
operations.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Call the ship over!
Tutorial.Tutorial_Area500_NearSpaceShip_17: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="4d950eab6db541b6b415322f182c0dd4" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="9" Type="2" From="0"/][Npc:LookAt To="10" Type="2" From="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Roger"/]S.S. Beagle repositioning successful!
Tutorial.Tutorial_Area500_NearSpaceShip_18: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="2daebb265c474f40af347a8634c701e4" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Good.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Our preparations are complete.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="2daebb265c474f40af347a8634c701e4" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Command"/]Let's find that treasure!
Tutorial.Tutorial_Area500_DiscoveryBuriedOnyon_P0: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="765c186d0e6d475d9c9c78a4a9caaffe" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]What's this?!
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="a8d4de897c0646d0838467dfed6a2458" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]Is it a treasure?
Tutorial.Tutorial_Area500_OnyonBootUp_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="2302d66ddd97459abd0d2b2cca451ef5" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_02_Survivor" name="Surprise"/]Huh?![etc:Wait frame="8"/] It moved![etc:Wait frame="15"/] I don't think it's
a treasure...
Tutorial.Tutorial_Area500_OnyonBootUp_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="79ae1edab9f24d8f915210b7a002a4cb" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_01_Survivor" name="Think"/]What could it be?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] It looks kind of like
a plant.
Tutorial.Tutorial_Area500_OnyonBootUp_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="b969969ca25d4737ab139db59a65c0c3" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_01_Survivor" name="TalkFaceOnly"/]Could this be that thing [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="CaptainOlimar"/]Captain Olimar[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]
wrote about in his Voyage Log?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="b969969ca25d4737ab139db59a65c0c3" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_01_Survivor" name="Yes"/]He called it an [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Onion[System:Color name="Default"].
Tutorial.Tutorial_Area500_OnyonBootUp_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="f3ce829ea69c458d81fa534162ac7d7b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]If this is an Onion,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] then what is
that sprout?
Tutorial.Tutorial_JoinPikminRed_Setup01: [Npc:LookAtInterpolation enable="0"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="4a3bdcdf40ac4b9a9e739894d1654802" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="GAvatar" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Carrot:LocalizeLanguage key="EUen"/]
Tutorial.Tutorial_JoinPikminRed_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="75bdaf5543d24fcf88db0f55b68e347a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_01_Survivor" name="Surprise"/]Oh my![etc:Wait frame="8"/] I think this could be a [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Pikmin[System:Color name="Default"]![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="75bdaf5543d24fcf88db0f55b68e347a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_01_Survivor" name="TalkFaceOnly"/]According to [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="CaptainOlimar"/]Captain Olimar[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s Voyage Log,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
they're friendly and helpful creatures.
Tutorial.Tutorial_JoinPikminRed_Reaction01: [Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="4bc0d946bf8b4a638591789ba3dda490" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_01_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Carrot:LocalizeLanguage key="EUen"/]
Tutorial.Tutorial_JoinPikminRed_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="8c9cbe7f71864ba39ab3e848f7adc2fe" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_01_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion name="NoMotionObie"/]W-well then...[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Maybe they could help us
while we explore and look for treasure...
Tutorial.Tutorial_JoinPikminRed_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="8c8f0f0c34cf41c5b09bfe83ac10f64f" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="3" Type="2" From="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Look at that![etc:Wait frame="15"/] [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s already bonding
with the Pikmin![etc:Wait frame="15"/] You should introduce
yourself as well, [Replace:ReplaceName Index="PlayerName"/].[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="8c8f0f0c34cf41c5b09bfe83ac10f64f" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="10" Type="2" From="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]And, um...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]Captain?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] How long do you intend
to hide back there?
Tutorial.Tutorial_CollectPellet_00: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="5100cf8e344f44e3b8a44c55b5cf9805" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]What?![etc:Wait frame="15"/] More sprouts!
Tutorial.Tutorial_CollectPellet_00a:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="210f77adad384683a56b99ddd3ff1c44" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]That red, seedlike thing we collected is
called a [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]pellet[System:Color name="Default"].[etc:Wait frame="15"/] It must be nutritious,
because it helps create more sprouts.
Tutorial.Tutorial_CollectPellet_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="6ea0dc156de249108c7b9e1bce45b63a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]That red, seedlike thing is apparently
called a [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]pellet[System:Color name="Default"].[etc:Wait frame="15"/] If you feed one to the
Onion,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] it will create more Pikmin.
Tutorial.Tutorial_CollectPellet_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="a554eb68743e4af4a5c7394af5b44861" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]There's something intriguing about those
sprouts.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I think we should get a closer look.
Tutorial.Tutorial_CollectPellet_03: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="94f94699be5741f7ab2f4669f4f1a330" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]What a mysterious life-form...
Tutorial.Tutorial_DiscoveryTreasure_01: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="3a1809a19a3b46d68473ebf8b74b254b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]Is this what I think it is?!
Tutorial.Tutorial_DiscoveryTreasure_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="a76e881cc97d436dbb3cc5c662e92a48" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]This has to be a [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]treasure[System:Color name="Default"]![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Just look at the
way it sparkles!
Tutorial.Tutorial_DiscoveryTreasure_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="c78d727d040748a8b5832505866b1999" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Let's check the Tablet to see if it's
emitting a high-energy reading.
Tutorial.Tutorial_DiscoveryTreasure_04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="f4c6d40c3a8246c398afe379dec08e01" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]Alright, rookie.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Press [PictureFont:IconData key="STAB" scale="0.66"/] to open
the [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Radar Map[System:Color name="Default"].
Tutorial.Tutorial_DiscoveryTreasure_05:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="1202b4df5abb435f899b055089a65d30" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Presence of [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]sparklium [System:Color name="Default"]confirmed![etc:Wait frame="15"/] That [PictureFont:IconData key="Icon_Otakara" scale="0.66"/]
in the center represents the treasure![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="1202b4df5abb435f899b055089a65d30" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]From now on, you can consult your
Radar Map to check if there's any
treasure in your area.
Tutorial.Tutorial_DiscoveryTreasure_06:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="2bce31c69ade477dade1d4eb011b209a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad02"/]Excellent work![etc:Wait frame="15"/] I'm going to take this
auspicious start as a good sign.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="2bce31c69ade477dade1d4eb011b209a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="QuestionFaceOnly"/]But, um...[etc:Wait frame="8"/] How are we going to move it?
Tutorial.Tutorial_Area500_FallingOtakara: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="5647b19b9ee44b6f91dbb853893a450f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]That was close.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Too close.
Tutorial.Tutorial_Area500_Tutorial_CollectTreasur:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="c5cfe61e9d184bffb1db186a5c92133f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]This treasure is large.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] How can we
physically collect something this big?

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="441fc552b1b143d69d3c4849fa3abe72" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]The ship uses a special type of light ray
that miniaturizes objects during collection,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
so it shouldn't be a problem.

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="4c1be27051ff45a9a49837b6b833c9f2" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/]I'll examine it with the sensors on the
S.S. Beagle right away.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Let's hope it
contains the type of energy we need.
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="9ecd5a794d7145f5920a17dbb3db42bb" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Yes![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Energy detected!

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="7d7c2348c8794fcd82fe21ffaef847ea" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]If we can collect [System:Color name="Emphasis" ][Carrot:RemainingKira/] more[System:Color name="Default"] units of
sparklium,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] we may be able to restart
the S.S. Shepherd.

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="780bb1e7786c45e1ade371d895a08889" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]But the S.S. Shepherd is supposed to run
on high-octane energy...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Will this work?

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="bd6164578ef24ae4bb3dc7297483524c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]I believe we can get it to run on sparklium
alone,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] though it may be a bumpier ride.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="bd6164578ef24ae4bb3dc7297483524c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SadFaceOnly"/]But before that can happen,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] we're going
to need a lot more.

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="efbc933843a44367b53a8d569a1505e9" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Command"/]Then we need to search the area for
more treasure!
Tutorial.Tutorial_Area500_Tutorial_DayEnd_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="89457986936d4c70a85de2511af7f51d" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="3" Type="2" From="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="10" Type="1" From="3"/][Npc:LookAt To="10" Type="1" From="4"/][Npc:LookAt To="3" Type="2" From="7"/][Npc:Motion name="GoodJob"/]You two make a fantastic combination,
[Replace:ReplaceName Index="PlayerName"/] and [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].
Tutorial.Tutorial_Area500_Tutorial_DayEnd_01_Choi: [Npc:Icon chara="Dummy"/][Npc:ResetMotion enable="1"/][Msg:BCancel enable="False"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="e61dd03ca5764194b4d11cbc101598c9" Scale="1"/]Thanks a bunch!
Tutorial.Tutorial_Area500_Tutorial_DayEnd_01_Reac: [Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="62e396d91f6f4adfa15c52788afc797f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="GAvatar" name="Yes" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_01_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Carrot:LocalizeLanguage key="EUen"/]
Tutorial.Tutorial_Area500_Tutorial_DayEnd_01_Choi: [Npc:ResetMotion enable="1"/][Msg:BCancel enable="False"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="a5981ac66bf04f6c863d230940df7614" Scale="1"/]Copy that!
Tutorial.Tutorial_Area500_Tutorial_DayEnd_01_Reac: [Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="2e558a637041490094434f0f1c065297" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="GAvatar" name="Roger02" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="GHappy" name="ICopy" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_01_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Carrot:LocalizeLanguage key="EUen"/]
Tutorial.Tutorial_Area500_Tutorial_DayEnd_01_01: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:ResetMotion enable="1"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="079d6a38db154ae3b56c991b665aac27" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Yes, yes.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Keep up the good work!
Tutorial.Tutorial_Area500_Tutorial_DayEnd_01_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:ResetMotion enable="1"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="4abc53b5b2f04fda9d2d6d7ec210d913" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="3" Type="2" From="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_02_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]You nailed it that time![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Of course, this isn't
quite the right occasion for a "copy that"...[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
But good effort, [Replace:ReplaceName Index="PlayerName"/]!
Tutorial.Tutorial_Area500_Tutorial_DayEnd_01_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:ResetMotion enable="1"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="526ac0975ca1463096289ddfd537bf92" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="21" Type="2" From="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="21" Type="2" From="3"/][Npc:LookAt To="21" Type="2" From="7"/][Npc:LookAt To="21" Type="1" From="4"/][Npc:Motion chara="GAvatar" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]The Pikmin are very obedient.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] They move
and work like tiny Rescue Pups.
Tutorial.Tutorial_Area500_Tutorial_DayEnd_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="340065a78f7e4eaaac659bc1d7b0f8f2" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="10" Type="2" From="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="6"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="3"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="1" From="4"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Now it's time to extract the energy
from the treasure.
Tutorial.Tutorial_Area500_Tutorial_DayEnd_03: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:ResetMotion enable="1"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="8da7e9ed99384e048302e3b7b42a4a60" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Command"/]Get started right away, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal01"/]Collin[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].
Tutorial.Tutorial_RestoreSpaceBus_Lv2_01_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="2c6b60e1066944c783719465b41d1fd5" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Energy from the treasure will soon
be extracted...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] It'll flow directly into
the S.S. Shepherd.
Tutorial.Tutorial_RestoreSpaceBus_Lv2_02_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="df4f660279f14be0a8b15f52f26e007c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]We did it![etc:Wait frame="15"/] The ship's back online![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="df4f660279f14be0a8b15f52f26e007c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]We still don't have enough energy to fly,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
but now we can use the radar to look for
our missing Rescue Officers!
Tutorial.Tutorial_RestoreSpaceBus_Lv2_02_P01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="3ab59b7daf584ea09e993cae08fb5199" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GoodJob"/]Excellent, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal01"/]Collin[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Boot it up, and see if we
pick up any signals.
Tutorial.Tutorial_RestoreSpaceBus_Lv2_03_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="48a291381de24b328a96724ea5c82dab" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="48a291381de24b328a96724ea5c82dab" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]I'm picking up multiple SOS signals![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="48a291381de24b328a96724ea5c82dab" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly"/]They could be coming from our lost
[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Rescue Officers[System:Color name="Default"] and even [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="CaptainOlimar"/]Captain Olimar[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]!
Tutorial.Tutorial_RestoreSpaceBus_Lv2_03_P01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="4d544a112a164037802ee8c159c2e2f2" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Then we don't have a moment to lose.[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
Time to get rescuing!
Tutorial.Tutorial_ResultTalk_Otakara_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="98eb5f3fba414c12bd1efdf06d3f95a6" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]That's...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]interesting.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] The ship is
automatically naming the objects?
Tutorial.Tutorial_ResultTalk_Otakara_P01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="10ca9b31e501452baf9e4ee582aeef69" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]We encounter unknown objects and
elements on our missions all the time,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] so I
had a naming AI installed on our new ships.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="10ca9b31e501452baf9e4ee582aeef69" Scale="1"/]Apparently it was cocreated by a famous
appraiser.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] It's more sophisticated than I
expected.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Pretty impressive!
Tutorial.Tutorial_ResultTalk_Otakara_P02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="baa5cb8c04cb42a4abc3170becc4c86f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]It is neat,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but a backup power source
probably would have been more helpful.
